text: Charalambos Aristotelous (Greek: Χαράλαμπος Αριστοτέλους; born 26 January 1995) is a Cypriot footballer who plays for Cypriot club PAEEK as a Midfielder.Charalambos Aristotelous Player profile, flashscore.com Aristotelous is a product of PAEEK's academy. ==Club== :Updated 03 September 2016. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club!!rowspan="2"|Season!!colspan="2"|Championship!!colspan="2"|Cup!!colspan="2"|Europe!!colspan="2"|Other!!colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|PAEEK |2013-14Charalambos Aristotelous player profile 2013-14 , Cyprus football association official website |26||1||1||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||27||1 |- |2014-15Charalambos Aristotelous player profile 2014-15 , Cyprus football association official website |24||1||3||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||27||1 |- |2015-16Charalambos Aristotelous player profile 2015-16 , Cyprus football association official website |24||3||1||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||25||3 |- !Total !74!!5!!5!!0!!colspan="2"|–!!colspan="2"|–!!79!!5 |- !colspan="2"|Career total !74!!5!!5!!0!!colspan="2"|–!!colspan="2"|–!!79!!5 |} ==References== ==External links== * Charalambos Aristotelous profile at Cfa.com.cy Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Anorthosis Famagusta FC players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Association football midfielders
